help-file.title: PHANTOM
help-file.content:
Phantoms are undead beings which lurk nearly anywhere. Usually of a solitary nature, they have been forced to band together with the other undead beings to survive in this battle torn environment. Their form is of an ethereal, semi-transparent nature which allows them to move through many obstacles that would normally hinder other earthly bodies, along with providing some magical resistance.
Class list: Psionicist, Reaver, Illusionist, Conjurer. Stats: Extremely agile and dexterous. Innate abilities: Ultravision, Shift_Astral, Shift_Prime, Phantasmal Form (level 21), Fly (level 21).
